title: FOLLOW YOU
lyrics:
On you no words
Forget about all the things you own
We'll really never know for sure
If we can mend all our broken bones
And I

I'll follow you there to find answers

And tie your arms around me

I'm not drowning



And I

I'll follow you there to find answers

Take your arms around me

Ill show you the way



A way of love

I'll follow you





A way of

A way of

A way of love



I don't wanna go back home but I can't stay here

Ill follow you into the fire

I just need you to let me know

Please let me know, oh



Forgetting why we own up and set in stone

Mining every broken bone

I promise to always let you know

I will let you know oh



And I

I'll follow you there to find answers

And tie your arms around me

I'm not drowning



And I

I'll follow you there to find answers

Take your arms around me

Ill show you the way



A way of love

I'll follow you





A way of love

Yeah

A way of love
